markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Smashing Tail](/Feats.aspx?ID=2535) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Ganzi" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=339" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 96 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You have a tail that serves as a potent weapon. You gain a tail unarmed attack that deals 1d6 bludgeoning damage, has the [sweep](/Traits.aspx?ID=194) trait, and is in the [brawling](/WeaponGroups.aspx?ID=4) weapon group.
name: Smashing Tail
